sentences.en: It is so noisy here that I can't think.
sentences.cn: 这里太吵了,我没法思考.

sentences.en: It might, at last, silence the small but noisy intellectual clique.
sentences.cn: 它可能最终会使这个聒噪的知识分子小圈子安静下来。

sentences.en: It's all been very noisy and bothersome in Parliament this week.
sentences.cn: 这个星期国会里一直乱哄哄的，让人心烦。

sentences.en: Looking after fifteen noisy children is no laughing matter.
sentences.cn: 照看15个吵吵嚷嚷的孩子可不是闹着玩的事.

sentences.en: Most of the children were noisy and boisterous.
sentences.cn: 大多数孩子都又吵又闹。

sentences.en: She found their laughter and noisy games coarse and rather vulgar.
sentences.cn: 她觉得他们的笑声和吵吵闹闹的游戏趣味低下，俗不可耐。

sentences.en: The baggage hall was crowded and noisy.
The car is quite noisy at speed.
sentences.cn: 这辆车高速行驶时噪音很大。

sentences.en: The kids have been really noisy today.
The marketplace was jammed with a noisy crowd of buyers and sellers.
sentences.cn: 集市上熙熙攘攘挤满了买卖东西的人。

sentences.en: The people in the room overhead were very noisy yesterday evening.
sentences.cn: 昨晚在楼上那个房间的人很吵.

sentences.en: The street was crowded and noisy.
The streets were noisy and full of activity.
sentences.cn: 街上熙熙攘攘，车水马龙。

sentences.en: This area can be very noisy at night-time .
sentences.cn: 这个地方夜间有时会非常吵。

sentences.en: When the children's play got too noisy, their mother called a halt.
sentences.cn: 当孩子们的游戏过于吵闹时, 他们的母亲叫他们停下来.

sentences.en: Wind turbines are large and noisy and they disfigure the landscape.
sentences.cn: 风力涡轮机个头大、噪音响，还会破坏周边风景。

words.tran_cn: 喧闹的,不和谐的,刺耳的,宏亮的

trans.tran_cn: 嘈杂的，喧闹的，充满噪音的，吵吵闹闹的
trans.tran_en: someone or something that is noisy makes a lot of noise
someone or something that is noisy makes a lot of noise
